混合变量网络分析

1 简介

如果你想要开展一项基于混合类型数据（即包含连续变量、二分类变量、多分类变量等不同类型数据）的网络分析，通常需要使用混合图模型（Mixed Graphical Models, MGM）进行分析。

混合图模型是一种统计模型，用于处理具有不同数据类型的网络结构。它通过组合不同类型的概率分布，来描述连续、二分类、多分类等不同类型的变量之间的相互关系。MGM 在网络分析中非常有用，因为它能够统一处理多种数据类型，并建立它们之间的条件依赖结构。

  • 连续变量：通常假设服从正态分布，适用于数据类型为实数的数据。

  • 二分类变量：常见于0/1变量，适用于存在两种可能结果的情况。

  • 多分类变量：用于处理多个类别（如”红”、“绿”、“蓝”等）的数据。

MGM 的目标是通过正则化技术（如 Lasso）来学习网络中节点之间的稀疏关系，使得网络结构更加清晰并具有解释性。

2 R语言实现

R软件包mgm可以轻松搞定混合图模型，这里给个简单的建模演示，并提供一个稳定性检验的思路。

2.1 导入包和数据

导入包：

导入数据：这里使用一份mgm自带的数据集，具体含义请?查看帮助文档。

head(autism_data$data) #数据
     Gender   IQ Integration in Society No of Comorbidities Type of Housing

autism_data$type  #变量类型

2.2 建模

fit_k2 = mgm(data = autism_data$data,  
             type = autism_data$type, 
             level = autism_data$lev, 
             k = 2) 

  |                                                                            
  |                                                                      |   0%
  |                                                                            
  |----------                                                            |  14%
  |                                                                            
  |--------------------                                                  |  29%
  |                                                                            
  |------------------------------                                        |  43%
  |                                                                            
  |----------------------------------------                              |  57%
  |                                                                            
  |--------------------------------------------------                    |  71%
  |                                                                            
  |------------------------------------------------------------          |  86%
  |                                                                            
  |----------------------------------------------------------------------| 100%
Note that the sign of parameter estimates is stored separately; see ?mgm

提取领接矩阵：

qgraph(fit_k2$pairwise$wadj,
       edge.color = fit_k2$pairwise$edgecolor,
       layout = "spring",
       labels =  autism_data$colnames)

2.4 边缘精确性分析

关于混合图网络模型到的精确性、差异性和稳定性检验，同样会用到bootnet包。bootnet包支持多种模型算法，但需要设置estimateNetwork封装，且需要设置default。

mgm_net = estimateNetwork(autism_data$data,
                          type = autism_data$type,
                          level = autism_data$lev,
                          default = 'mgm')
Estimating Network. Using package::function:
  - mgm::mgm for network computation
    - Using glmnet::glmnet
Warning in (function (data, type, level, tuning = 0.25, missing = c("listwise",
: Bootnet does not support unsigned edges and treats these as positive edges.
print(mgm_net)

=== Estimated network ===
Number of nodes: 7 
Number of non-zero edges: 13 / 21 
Mean weight: 0.09694593 
Network stored in mgm_net$graph 
 
Default set used: mgm 
 
Use plot(mgm_net) to plot estimated network 
Use bootnet(mgm_net) to bootstrap edge weights and centrality indices 

Relevant references:

    Jonas M. B. Haslbeck, Lourens J. Waldorp (2016). mgm: Structure Estimation for Time-Varying Mixed Graphical Models in high-dimensional Data arXiv preprint:1510.06871v2 URL http://arxiv.org/abs/1510.06871v2.
    Epskamp, S., Borsboom, D., & Fried, E. I. (2016). Estimating psychological networks and their accuracy: a tutorial paper. arXiv preprint, arXiv:1604.08462.

绘图：

plot(mgm_net, layout = 'spring')

centralityPlot(mgm_net)

重抽样，为了节约时间，这里仅抽样50次：

set.seed(123)
boot_results2 = bootnet(mgm_net, nBoots = 50,default = 'mgm',
                         type = "nonparametric",nCores = 8)
Note: bootnet will store only the following statistics:  edge, strength, outStrength, inStrength
Bootstrapping...
Computing statistics...

可以把数据存储起来，代码可以这样写的save(boot_results2, file = “mgm_boot_results2_mgm.RData”)，我这里就不运行了。

然后，可以通过画图看看边缘估计的精确性：

plot(boot_results2, labels=FALSE, order="sample")

部分边缘的95%CI还是有些宽的（阴影部分）。

2.5 差异性分析

2.5.1 中心性指标

一般会检验强度中心性（Strength），下面的代码检验了各节点的Strength是否有显著差异。

#  节点差异性检验  输出数值
library(tidyverse)
res2 = summary(boot_results2) %>% 
  ungroup %>% 
  filter(type == "edge") %>% 
  arrange(-sample)
res2
# A tibble: 21 × 17
   type  id        node1 node2 sample   mean     sd CIlower CIupper   q2.5 q97.5

#   var_non0 <dbl>, sd_non0 <dbl>, prop0 <dbl>

可视化看看，结论会更清晰。

# 节点的两两比较，黑色表示显著
plot(boot_results2, statistics="Strength", plot="difference",order = "mean")
Expected significance level given number of bootstrap samples is approximately: 0.049

如果你对此图的含义还不清楚，可以回看前面的"横断面网络"一节。

2.5.2 边缘比较

plot(boot_results2, "edge", plot = "difference", 
     onlyNonZero = TRUE, order = "sample")
Expected significance level given number of bootstrap samples is approximately: 0.05

2.6 稳定性分析

与普通网络分析的方法类似，可以采用案例剔除法+bootstrap进行稳定性分析。bootnet提供了一个好用的接口，但此处需要额外调整下default。

drop_res = bootnet(mgm_net, nBoots = 100, default = "mgm", 
                  type="case", statistics="all",nCores = 12) #减轻计算负担
Bootstrapping...
Computing statistics...

求稳定性相关系数：

#计算相关稳定性系数
corStability(drop_res) 
=== Correlation Stability Analysis === 

Sampling levels tested:
   nPerson Drop%  n
1      880  75.0 10
2     1154  67.2  9
3     1428  59.4  9
4     1702  51.7  8
5     1976  43.9  8
6     2250  36.1 14
7     2523  28.3  4
8     2797  20.6  9
9     3071  12.8 18
10    3345   5.0 11

Maximum drop proportions to retain correlation of 0.7 in at least 95% of the samples:

betweenness: 0.517 
  - For more accuracy, run bootnet(..., caseMin = 0.439, caseMax = 0.594) 

closeness: 0.517 
  - For more accuracy, run bootnet(..., caseMin = 0.439, caseMax = 0.594) 

distance: 0.75 (CS-coefficient is highest level tested)
  - For more accuracy, run bootnet(..., caseMin = 0.672, caseMax = 1) 

edge: 0.75 (CS-coefficient is highest level tested)
  - For more accuracy, run bootnet(..., caseMin = 0.672, caseMax = 1) 

eigenvector: 0.75 (CS-coefficient is highest level tested)
  - For more accuracy, run bootnet(..., caseMin = 0.672, caseMax = 1) 

expectedInfluence: 0.75 (CS-coefficient is highest level tested)
  - For more accuracy, run bootnet(..., caseMin = 0.672, caseMax = 1) 

hybrid: 0.75 (CS-coefficient is highest level tested)
  - For more accuracy, run bootnet(..., caseMin = 0.672, caseMax = 1) 

length: 0 
  - For more accuracy, run bootnet(..., caseMin = 0, caseMax = 0.05) 

rspbc: 0.75 (CS-coefficient is highest level tested)
  - For more accuracy, run bootnet(..., caseMin = 0.672, caseMax = 1) 

strength: 0.75 (CS-coefficient is highest level tested)
  - For more accuracy, run bootnet(..., caseMin = 0.672, caseMax = 1) 

Accuracy can also be increased by increasing both 'nBoots' and 'caseN'.

可以看到，几个重要的指标（强度、预期影响等）的相关稳定性系数都大于0.25，部分指标系数高达0.75，符合最低要求。

绘图可能更为直观一点：

plot(drop_res, statistics="all")
